amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 2, 13, 14, 15, 16, 21, 23, 25, 27, 28, 40, 43, 57, 74, 83, 95, 97, 102, 107, and 126 contained in House Report 112-485 and printed on pages H2998-H3008 of the Congressional Record for May 17, 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: Amendments Nos. 2, 13, 14, 15, 16, 21, 23, 25, 27, 28, 40, 43, 57, 74, 83, 95, 97, 102, 107, and 126 printed in House Report 112-485.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. McKeon.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
